wifiNote: Make sure internet is enabled on your device
qr: Scan the QR code on the cover of the gateway to connect to the cloud
userNote: To change user data, correct the values ​​in the fields as required and click the ''Change'' button
fieldIsEmpty: The field must not be empty
cameraNotAccess: Camera access is prohibited for this application
WifiAlreadyNote: The app is already connected to this network
WifiErrorNote: Perhaps the entered data is incorrect or the network is currently unavailable
userAlreadyExist: A user with the same name already exists
repeatPassworError: Password and password repeat do not match
userDeletingNote: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
userChanignNote: Are you sure you want to change this user?
paswordError: Incorrect password. Make sure your username or password is correct
userError: There is no user with this name
